Package com.dungeon.animation

Class PlayerAnimation

java.lang.Object
com.dungeon.animation.PlayerAnimation
public class PlayerAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
A class managing player animations

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlayerAnimation()
    Gets all the players animation sheets.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void animate​(Player player)
    Figures out the correct frame to show and animates the character.
    boolean attacking()
    Checks if the user is currently attacking or not.
    void changeStateTime()
    Incremenet the state time by the time between the current frame and previous frame.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> createAttackingAnimation​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture attackSheet)
    Takes an attacking texture sheet and splits it up to create and return an animation.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> createIdleAnimation​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture idleSheet)
    Takes an idling texture sheet and splits it up to create and return an animation.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> createWalkingAnimation​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture walkSheet)
    Takes a walking texture sheet and splits it up to create and return an animation.
    void dispose()
    Disposes of all the used textures.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion flipFrame​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion tempCurrentFrame, int direction)
    Checks if the frame passed in needs to be flipped to face the correct direction.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> getAttackAnimation​(int directionFacing)
    Gets the necessary attack animation depending on the direction the player is facing.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getAttackFrame()
    Gets the current attack frame to be displayed.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getIdleFrame()
    Gets the necessary idle frame depending on the direction the player is facing.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getWalkOrIdleFrame()
    Depending on the current keyboard controls being pressed, a frame from one of the walking or idling animations is grabbed and returned to be rendered.
    void restartAttackAnimation()
    Restart the attack animation.
    void setDirectionFacing​(int directionFacing)  
    void zeroStateTime()
    Set the state time to 0.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerAnimation

      public PlayerAnimation()
      Gets all the players animation sheets. Uses these sheets to create the animation frames.

  • Method Details

    • animate

      public void animate​(Player player)
      Figures out the correct frame to show and animates the character.
      Parameters:
      player -

    • getWalkOrIdleFrame

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getWalkOrIdleFrame()
      Depending on the current keyboard controls being pressed, a frame from one of the walking or idling animations is grabbed and returned to be rendered.
      Returns:
      the frame to be rendered

    • flipFrame

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion flipFrame​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion tempCurrentFrame, int direction)
      Checks if the frame passed in needs to be flipped to face the correct direction. If it does, it flips it and returns it.
      Parameters:
      tempCurrentFrame - the frame to check and maybe flip
      direction - the direction the character is facing
      Returns:
      the frame facing the correct direction

    • getAttackAnimation

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> getAttackAnimation​(int directionFacing)
      Gets the necessary attack animation depending on the direction the player is facing.
      Parameters:
      directionFacing - the direction the player is facing
      Returns:
      the animation

    • attacking

      public boolean attacking()
      Checks if the user is currently attacking or not.
      Returns:
      true if attacking - false if not attacking

    • getAttackFrame

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getAttackFrame()
      Gets the current attack frame to be displayed.
      Returns:
      the attack animation frame

    • restartAttackAnimation

      public void restartAttackAnimation()
      Restart the attack animation.

    • getIdleFrame

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getIdleFrame()
      Gets the necessary idle frame depending on the direction the player is facing.
      Returns:
      the frame to render

    • changeStateTime

      public void changeStateTime()
      Incremenet the state time by the time between the current frame and previous frame.

    • zeroStateTime

      public void zeroStateTime()
      Set the state time to 0.

      Parameters:

      Takes a walking texture sheet and splits it up to create and return an animation.
      Parameters:
      walkSheet - the walking sheet to create an animation from
      Returns:
      the created animation

    • createIdleAnimation
